info.title: Cisco-IOS-XE-app-hosting-cfg
info.description:
This module contains a collection of YANG definitions
     for app-hosting configuration data.
     Copyright (c) 2019-2020, 2022 by Cisco Systems, Inc.
     All rights reserved.

**Configuration Module**
**Module:** `Cisco-IOS-XE-app-hosting-cfg`
**Paths:** 9

**📊 YANG Tree:** [View Cisco-IOS-XE-app-hosting-cfg structure](https://jeremycohoe.github.io/cisco-ios-xe-openapi-swagger/yang-trees/Cisco-IOS-XE-app-hosting-cfg.html)

put.description: Create or replace app-hosting configuration data

post.description: Add a new entry to Application info (collection)
